name: DuckDuckGo Google Look
description:
Light version of DuckDuckGo Dark Google Look!

Dark version:
https://userstyles.org/styles/133256/duckduckgo-dark-google-look

Found bugs? Let me know!
Got suggestions? Send me feedback!

Thank you for using the theme!

user.name: Linuxcfg

additional_info:
Change log:

24/10/2019
Changed the name from "Google 4 DuckDuckGo" to "DuckDuckGo Google Look".

19/04/2019
Fixed the Google logo that was cut out on the sides. 

27/09/2017
The size of the "Google" logo was updated. It should have the normal size now.
